nodes.text: "The Rebellion Is Reborn" is a concert suite and a track of the The Last Jedi score that was written by John Williams for the eponymous 2017 film. The musical score is the first concert arrangement of the Star Wars saga to feature all of the main new leitmotifs of The Last Jedi, showcasing Rose Tico's Theme and the Luke exile motif. However, the track itself is not featured in the film.

In addition to including the leitmotifs of Rose Tico and Luke Skywalker in exile, "The Rebellion Is Reborn" references "The Imperial March," as well as a recurring arpeggio similar to the mystery motif.
